def_cn: （社会、家族或体系）母系的,母权的
def_en: A matriarchal society, family, or system is one in which the rulers are female and power or property is passed from mother to daughter.

def_cn: （家庭或群体）女性统治的，以女性为中心的
def_en: A matriarchal family or group is one in which women are more powerful or important than men.
If you describe a woman as matriarchal, you mean that she has authority and power within her family or group.
